feature.label: aopalliance external dependency
feature.provider-name: Software Engineering Group, Heinz Nixdorf Institute, Paderborn University, Germany (NOT the author)
feature.description: This feature provides a plugin that the ships aopalliance-1.0.jar, which is provided by the opt4j-3.1.3.zip archive (http://opt4j.sourceforge.net/download.html). For more information about aopalliance, see http://sourceforge.net/projects/aopalliance
